Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

`` There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there,'' Aaron Rodgers said to wild applause. David Letterman asked Aaron Rodgers why he was not recruited out of high school to a major college. I think a number of reasons: one, I wasn't, you know- even today, I'm not gon na be the guy who pops out as- you know, I'm not 6-5, I'm not 240, I don't run a 4.5 40. But I think a lot of times, the things you can't measure are often the things that give people the most success, Aaron Rodgers said. The NoW said the New York Times story relied on unsubstantiated allegations from unnamed sources or claims from disgruntled former employees that should be treated with extreme scepticism . The paper has rejected suggestions there was a widespread culture of hacking and said it had a`` zero tolerance approach to any wrongdoing''.
